description:
Open 7 days a week from 8am-8pm
FREE packaging (custom box, tape, label, materials)
“Shyp is magical.” - NY Times // “Shipping stuff is a hassle. Shyp will do it for you.” - Fast Company
*** SUPPORTED CITIES *** San Francisco // New York City // Brooklyn // Miami // LA soon (coverage details below)

“Shyp enables users to simplify the process of shipping items basically anywhere in the world.” - TechCrunch

Shyp is the easiest way to send your items anywhere in the world. In short, we’re here to make shipping magical! 

Your role --
you take a photo of the item you want to ship
you enter the destination address on your phone 
you choose a shipping speed // cost
you request a pickup 

Our role -- 
we come to you to pick up your unboxed item
we package it safely with our proprietary boxes
we send it with the best priced carrier
we provide support and tracking the whole way through

Features // Benefits:
-  On demand pickup within 20 minutes
-  FREE packaging (custom box, tape, label, and materials are all free)
-  FREE shipment tracking
-  World class partners (Fedex, UPS, USPS, DHL)


Returning items you bought on Zappos or Amazon?............Send them back with Shyp.

Worried about your item?............Every shipment is covered with $1,000 USD of insurance.

Need to ship internationally?............Shyp takes care of all the customs paperwork.

Need to move large bulky items?............ Shyp takes care of packing and sending it, even heavy items.
---
Open 7 days a week from 8am-8pm

Coverage Details:
San Francisco (proper)
New York City (up to 96th street)
Brooklyn: (11201, 11205, 11206, 11211, 11213, 11215, 11216, 11217, 11222, 11231, 11232, 11237, 11238, 11249, 11251)
Miami: (33125, 33127, 33128, 33129, 33130, 33131, 33132, 33133, 33135, 33136, 33137, 33138, 33139, 33140, 33141, 33142, 33145, 33147, 33150, 33154)
Los Angeles: Soon


Have any questions? Please visit the FAQ on our website or in the app. 
You can also email help@shyp.com or call us at (855) 749-7437.

Twitter: @shyp
Facebook: www.facebook.com/shyp
Instagram: @teamshyp
